title: Marvel Heroes Live Wallpaper v1.7 [FULL].apk
description:
Prepare to experience the marvelous might of your favorite super heroes, direct from the pages of Marvel Comics!

THE ONLY OFFICIAL PERSONALIZATION APP FOR GOOGLE PLAY FEATURING THE MARVEL UNIVERSE!

Get The Marvel Universe Live Wallpaper, (clocks and sticker widgets too), for your favorite heroes - SPIDER-MAN, WOLVERINE, IRON MAN, THOR, DOCTOR DOOM, CAPTAIN AMERICA, DAREDEVIL, THE THING, CYCLOPS and HULK!

- Tap the screen once any of the live wallpapers are set to your home screen and
  watch / listen as a character specific effect unfurls, directly related to the
  heroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s powers!
- Slowly rotate your device and observe the 3D-like custom effect added to each
  live wallpaper; every hero bursts from the screen!
- Watch the background closely as each live wallpaper has custom animations built
  in to bring your favorite super heroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s world to life!
- Visit your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Widgets section to drag and drop the Marvel Comics Clock
